website_summaries.verdict: It's a stylish choice, but quality issues put a damper on this bag's reputation.
pros: Attracts customers seeking a comfortable bag with multiple easily accessible storage pockets

customer_reviews.title: LOOK at these pictures and PLEASE don’t waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: LOOK at these pictures and PLEASE don’t waste your money on this!! Not a twin friendly bag as I read!!! I have 5 kids and have used many diaper bags in the past. This has been the worst!!! All the positive reviews had to have been the company or paid. After 1 use the handles ripped and began to fray. It wasn’t even overloaded! I didn’t even use it because it looked so bad after 3 uses. I left it set in my car for emergencies and use my old one or a backpack. See these photos. It wasn’t actually carried more than a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna27k

customer_reviews.title: So I had another color of diaper bag just like this, and I loved it so much I ...
customer_reviews.text: So I had another color of diaper bag just like this, and I loved it so much I bought this one! Super cute and I love the way it carries/fits! But the sides of my old one did tear easily at the seam, but I don't know if that is from regular wear and tear, or if it was because I really put my bags to good use ha ha! So we will see if this one tears as easily as the last one, but so far, I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this diaper bag. It is my second time purchasing it. The first one lasted me for 4 years, through 2 kids. Now with my 3rd kid I was very excited to purchase it again. I previously purchased a few other diaper bags and ended up returning them. None of them were as easy to use as this one. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: TheBookJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this diaper bag for my first child in the grey and it lasted literally 3 years with heavy use before it started to fall apart. I recently gave birth and HAD to have this one again. You will not need any other bag ever.. except maybe a small one for quick ventures bevause this bag is HUGE (in a good way) you dont wanna lug it around for a quick trip to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee

customer_reviews.title: I really love this bag to the point I'm considering continuing to ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bag to the point I'm considering continuing to carry it as a large purse once my youngest is out of diapers. Aside from the aesthetics, it's also comfortable to carry and if you don't want to carry it, the stroller straps make that an easy possibility! I LOVE the stroller straps. It has little compartments to organize your bag how you see fit. I also love that it's not adorned with cartoon characters. It's YOUR bag, not the baby's.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: So much room!  Looks really nice too.
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected. Loads of room. Front pockets hold my massive bottles and the middle fits my laptop very easily plus a ton more stuff. Back pockets are as big as front. Side pockets are too small for water bottles but great for keys and gum! Looks high quality and feels really sturdy. I love the metal nuns on bottom to help it stand up on its own!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I get ENDLESS compliments on this bag! It’s spacious, perfect to throw over my shoulder, and my daughter has used it as a weekender for sleepovers! It’s the best! The pockets in the inside fit multiple diapers easily and a pack of wipes. I can also easily fit extra outfits, my personal stuff, and everything for the baby! The rubbery straps for the stroller are also super convenient!
customer_reviews.author: dawnariana

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this bag
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag! It huge! I have 3 babies/toddlers in diapers, and I use cloth diapers on the newborn. I can fit all of her clothes, diapers and blankets she need for a day out, plus the boys diapers, wipes, my wallet and other little essentials. Its really cute too! :) The only issue I had was that the first one was missing the shoulder strap, and the thread was loose on the handle. We contacted Amazon, and they sent a new one right away.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Muscarella

customer_reviews.title: Stylish bag and GREAT customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I have yet to use the bag so can't speak to durability yet (my little guy is due in a month). But, the bag description said it comes with stroller clips (which it did) and a changing pad (which was missing). I called the customer service number for JJ Cole/TOMY and they got my name and address to ship me a changing pad, no hassle! What a nice breath of fresh air! I was disappointed when I received the bag without this but their swift action turned my feelings right around and now I cannot wait to use the bag. It is so cute and spacious!
customer_reviews.author: oconnorsrb

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I've had this diaper bag for about 3 months and I love it. It's roomy with 14 pockets. I have the stroller hooks on my stroller so when I need them they are there for a quick attachment. I had a couple glasses of wine spilled on it at a wedding and I ran to the bathroom, took everything out and ran the fabric under the faucet and the red wine came out. It's like a seatbelt type fabric and it didn't absorb the stain or smell at all. I'm impressed. I think it will last the longest of all the diaper bags I've had.
customer_reviews.author: TheMrs.R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but SLOW SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, canvas material. Perfect neutral pattern and color ( I got grey). So well made. The model in the picture is obviously a very tiny person because although it is a good size it is not as big as it looks in the ad so pay attention to measurements in the item description. The changing pad included is filmy and cheap, but l purchased the matching changing wallet and it is beautiful and very nicely made. The stroller attachments are a great bonus! I knocked off a star because a shipping took 10.5 days. So slow!
customer_reviews.author: CaraBou

customer_reviews.title: It's great to have a diaper bag that looks like a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great to have a diaper bag that looks like a purse. I'd love a zippered pocket inside somewhere (for MY stuff), but overall it has a great number of pockets and can fit a LOT of stuff!! I have water bottles, snacks, changes of clothes, activities, you name it. And room for a clutch purse for myself in case I want to grab and go without the kids :) After about 6 months of very heavy use, some of the plastic/vinyl on the straps is cracking/peeling a little, but for the price it is and the beating it's taking, I don't have a complaint in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! I have received many compliments on it and it's a sturdy, well put together bag. I love the large straps including the messenger bag strap option. The stroller attachments work great and the bag has many big compartments. My only disappointment is the diaper changing pad included is very thin and I would have liked to see something with a bit more padding.
customer_reviews.author: P0k0d0ts

customer_reviews.title: Luxury at affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this bag. I wanted a diaper that looked like a handbag. This is it. Its a very nice looking bag. Medium bag to hold all you basic baby supplies and items for mom too. Easy to hang on stroller or throw over your shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Riri

customer_reviews.title: SENT WRONG BAG. . but
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the wrong diaper bag. This listing is for "Stone Arbor" and I received a black one called "Charcoal Infinity". Interestingly, the picture on the product tag of the one that I received also shows the bag in the Stone color, but the barcode does say Charcoal. I do like the pattern (It's very similar) and I need to use it now, so I am going to keep it anyway. The lining/inside pocket material seems kind of thin, but over all the bag seems sturdy, and there are lots of pockets to . . organize/lose things in ;) I really like that it looks like a large purse rather than a kiddy diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag wonderful. Stroller clips useless
customer_reviews.text: after shopping around, this was the bag I settled on, and I'm very glad. It has all useful pockets, is very hardy, has handy selection of straps and is light. It also has feet on the bottom. Only downside - stroller clips are hopeless. Don't even bother as they come off all the time and then one snapped due to the weight of the bag (which had only the usual things in it and was not excessively heavy). Buy stroller clips from Freddie and Sebbie if you need them, because once the JJ Cole clips break, you can't even purchase them again separately anywhere in Australia or for online delivery.
customer_reviews.author: hungryandhappy

customer_reviews.title: Overall this is a good diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good diaper bag. It's really roomy and holds a lot of gear. The print is nice and classy. I actually threw the bag in my washing machine to clean it and it held up perfectly. My only complaint is the handles have that plastic sealant on the edges that always wears out way before the bag does. I used the bag for four months before switching to another brand for daily use, not for a particular reason, I just liked the other bag too. This is definitely a keeper though, great to have in the baby gear rotation.
customer_reviews.author: SFSLS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sister-in-law for Christmas & she absolutely loves it. She has a 18 month old & is due in June & this should work for both kids stuff.
customer_reviews.author: cardshark

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and handy
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag! It's stylish and a great size! So many diaper bag styles are backpacks or large totes, this satchel is perfect! It has plenty of interior and exterior pockets and is constructed very well. I cannot wait yo fill it and use it for my son come November!
customer_reviews.author: CarpeOmnia

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart within months. I ended up cutting the straps off because they were cracked and frayed then the cross body strap broke off. Total garbage
customer_reviews.author: SuperMom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it love it love it!! So far it's been amazing! I had another one but it didn't hold much so I got this one. I've heard about the straps wearing at the metal part but haven't had it long enough to see this. But it's great. It's got many pockets and holds so much! I use the shoulder strap more than the little handles. And it comes with stroller hanging attachments--pretty cool but I haven't used them much. Over all it's great. Stylish and bigger than most--I get alot of good comments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Robbyn

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: The PERFECT diaper bag if you have more than one child. We have infant twins and a 3 year old. It came with the changing mat and the straps to hook it to my stroller. Those straps keep it handy so it's not in the bottom of the stroller. It fits plenty of diapers, wipes, bottles, formula, clothes, my wallet and a few small toys. I don't have a single complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bag every day for almost a year now. I have a 3 year old and an almost 1 year old. It's big enough to fit both of their stuff in it and yet not too overly huge that I don't like carrying it. It's also so cute! You can barely even tell it's used. I would recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: FultonWifeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Make it better please
customer_reviews.text: There are so many things I love about this bag! It's very stylish, I've gotten many compliments. It's huge and has lots of compartments. Now the bad side- it started falling apart almost immediately, especially where the rings attach to the straps. So despite it being a beautiful and functional bag in many ways, it looks ragged like I've owned it for far longer than I have. I'm very disappointed and would not recommend this bag:-( It's really too bad.
customer_reviews.author: mommymccarty

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I've just recently moved to a large bag. My daughter is nearly 3. This bag has been awesome. The pockets and space in the middle pocket fit everything I ever needed. I love the outside pockets. They made quick and convenient access to phones, keys, papers, etc. This bag is cute and always felt more like a cute bag than diaper bag. The straps held up really well. The only thing that didn't hold up is the stroller straps, but too be fair, I asked a lot of them. One. day my bag just dropped to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Cinda Linton

customer_reviews.title: I thought this bag was really cute but I am extremely disappointed in the quality of the bag
customer_reviews.text: I only had this bag a week or two and the threads started coming out of the handles. Now that I have had it a month over half the threads are gone and the handle is starting to look worn. I have even been using the stroller clips creating less wear on the handles and that doesn't really seem to help. I thought this bag was really cute but I am extremely disappointed in the quality of the bag. I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sauls

customer_reviews.title: This is the most amazing diaper bag in the entire world
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing diaper bag in the entire world. I have searched all over the place and can not find one that is better. Not only is it an amazing price but it's stylish and huge. I get complaints on this bag daily. It holds everything I need for my son and everything I need for myself no problem. The straps are so comfortable and the stroller straps are amazing. I love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: R. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look, size, and layout of this bag. I would have loved it forever, but after just 3 months of use the seams along all 4 corners ripped wide open, and I mean 6-8 inch rips. It is now totally unusable. Considering the price of this bag, the quality is unacceptable and makes this bag a horrible value. If you want something stylish for occasional light us, then be my guest, but if you want something you can use several times a week then forget it.
customer_reviews.author: JALeo23

customer_reviews.title: Favorite diaper bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite diaper bag ever and I have had lots of different diaper bags! It is the perfect size and has lots of pockets for you and your baby. It would work amazing if you have twins or two children still in diapers. I absolutely love this bag. No signs of any wear and tear at all and seems like it will hold up for more of my future children to come. I love how stylish it is, i get lots of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: shawnee hellman

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag!! I ordered it when I was pregnant with my son, not knowing the inside was pink! But I decided who cares because it's MY bag & that was the only surprise about this bag! It's been sturdy, holds together well through my kids trampling it, etc!! My son is almost 2 & just now starting to see some cracks/fraying in the handles. But that's pretty good Id say. Love this bag, would buy 100 more like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, just not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend the money on a new diaper bag, especially on a third child. I had barely used one with my second. A larger purse worked just fine, but my husband convinced me to splurge. The size has been great. I love the stroller straps and have received good comments when I pull them out to use them. However, I have only been using the bag for about 2 months and one of the outside end pockets is tearing at the stitching, and the leather like loops that connect the bag to the metal rings on the handles are fraying and breaking. I'm really sad about it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Have t had any issues with this coming apart. Been using it for three months and it’s held up well.
customer_reviews.author: MBenson

customer_reviews.title: Trendy.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! I wanted something I could wear cross body. There's plenty of room with lots of pockets. I do have to say this bag is prop ably not a good idea for a bottle feeding mama. It has side pockets that seem to be for bottles but they're not insulated. If you're just looking for a good diaper bag for just that; diapers and extra clothes, this it it. It's very stylish. The triller hooks (comes with them) are very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Houseman

customer_reviews.title: JJ cole bag
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this bag through Amazon, at a great price! I had been eying it for months and finally gave in, after my last 2 diaper bags had zipper malfunctions. I was not disappointed! The color (grey/white) and design are lovely. The inside is lined with a lime green. The pockets on the side of the bag are large enough for bottles/sippy cups and the pockets in front/back (though they don't zipper), have been useful to store my wallet/phone/keys. The bag also comes with a messenger strap and 2 stroller attachments/hooks. My husband (although he thinks it's still girly) also thought it was really nice. I would recommend this bag to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Chin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my JJ Cole Diaper bag and used it for three months after i quit carrying diapers! I love how it doesnt have the traditional look of a diaper bag and is stylish yet functional. The straps that come with it saved a lot of stress when we would use the stroller. I also got tons of compliments on the bag - which is ALWAYS a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Cait B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: It matches our JJ Cole collection nicely and it fits all the baby things we have. It isnt boring over overly bulky like other bags and I especially like the lime green inside. It has multiple compartments inside and outside of the bag with two bottle holders on the end. It comes with a shoulder strap and handles as well. Its small enough to fit where you need it, like under a stroller, but large enough to fit everything you need in it!
customer_reviews.author: Verified review

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a bit before my son was born. I carried it for...just about 3 years. It was my purse and diaper bag. It took a lot of abuse before one of the zipper pulls finally broke. It was one of the small front zippers so we still sometimes use this as an overnight bag. I loved this bag! Kinda miss it's roominess at times to be honest...
customer_reviews.author: MommaDealio

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, but it's falling apart!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bag, it's beautiful and stylish and functional and exactly what I wanted. But I've only been using it for a month (maybe 8-10 trips out with it) and the seams on one end of the bag are just completely falling apart. The stitching seems to come out very easily. I guess I'll try to repair it myself, but I'm quite disappointed that the quality isn't better for a bag at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: My baby isn't due for another two months, however I'm extremely satisfied with the looks and size of this bag. I wanted something big enough I can carry all of the new babies items in along with my purse necessities, and anything for my 5 year old. I think this will do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: R. Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Works great for all my baby supplies! Lots of room in the pockets. I overpack and this bag fits all my stuff for baby. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SHAY

customer_reviews.title: I spent months looking for this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found the perfect bag for me!! I'm cloth diapering so there is plenty of space/pockets on the inside to pack clean dipes and wipes and a wet bag for the dirties as well as room for extra outfits and blankets. The style is cute and modern and i love the stroller hooks to hook it to the stroller handle bars. Also the messenger style strap is a comfy necessary must!!
customer_reviews.author: HealthNut

customer_reviews.title: While she also got three other nice bags, this was her favorite as it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag and the accoutrements for my daughter's baby shower. While she also got three other nice bags, this was her favorite as it is roomy, well made, doesn't look cheap, and has so many pockets for organization, which she really appreciates. It also looks nice with the stroller when she is out and about. It is certainly her favorite bag. Score for grandma!
customer_reviews.author: DaMama1

customer_reviews.title: 6 months ago i would have said i loved it...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bag when i bought it. It looks more like a purse than a diaper bag -- which is what i wanted. The color is fabulous, and the inside lining is a nice green. The size is good -- not too huge, but fits everything you need. I thought it was perfect -- and then i carried it a while. The straps have frayed and there is a tear developing where the straps meet the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love love LOVE this bag. It has a wide open compartment on the inside, which is just what I was looking for, but you can still separate items out between the six smaller compartments inside as well. Great quality and doesn't look like a typical diaper bag. It just ends up doubling as my purse when I'm out with my son!
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag, I wish the pockets were a little ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag, I wish the pockets were a little bigger and the inside as well. This is great for one child in diapers, but trying to add the pull ups and spare clothes for another is a little difficult. Definitely a great bag when on the go, but not to daycare when they need more. I think I'll buy the bigger JJ Cole because the quality is great and super cute!
customer_reviews.author: vhicks

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and Perfect for Us!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my bag! It is the perfect size for my baby, some of my 4-year-olds things, and for my own. It has a perfect amount of pockets and unlike other diaper bags, if you put things in the pockets on the inside, they don't take over the middle section. Not to mention, the bag is really cute and more like a tote than a diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute diaper bag. It's nice and big so you can easily store a lot of things. I didn't realize it already came with the stroller hooks and almost ordered them separately-- so don't buy them, they come with the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Lir

customer_reviews.title: its been an awesome bag and it has so much room and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive owned this bag for 3 years. At about 1 year, a large rip opened up the side stitching. I had it repaired locally. It just ripped out again a little bigger so I am replacing it. Other than that, the material gives around the metal rings. Overall, its been an awesome bag and it has so much room and I love all the pockets and it holds enough stuff for a baby, a toddler and most of my purse.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kate

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTLY PRICED DIAPER BAG AND CHANGING PAD
customer_reviews.text: The recipient of this diaper bag loves it! Plus it comes with the matching changing pad. We priced this at a local baby supply store and saved about $30 purchasing it through Amazon. Great produce, well made, and is already in use!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Gebron

customer_reviews.title: I’m obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so much! It’s beautiful it’s made very well the material is strong I love the padding on the strap everything on this bag is very good quality I was not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find one in the store to "feel" before I bought but I couldn't be happier with this. It is large but doesn't seem "too big" once you have your hands on it. It has great pockets which make it super friendly. I also love that the shoulder straps stay in place on my shoulder as well as the long strap make it so the bag does what I need when I need it! DEFINITELY recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: m.zeg

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bag. I thought I loved it. But then I found myself not wanting to take it anywhere! Just seemed too big for daily trips to the store/park/church/restaurant. It is very well made and I love the organization of it. Just not practical for the daily needs of my three little ones and me. I ended up returning it and buying the JJ Cole Zoey bag, which I absolutely love.
customer_reviews.author: Mela

customer_reviews.title: Love It, just the right size!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a baby bag for a while before buying this one, it was the one I kept coming back to. I knew I wanted a bigger baby bag and I wanted it to be different than all the ones you see in the stores! Very chic bag, everyone always comments on it and asks surprisingly if that is my baby bag. I can keep everything I may or may not need when we take our baby out. Im a first time mom, so I would rather have more than what I need than not to have it at all. I love the design and is very durable I will have this bag for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Francis

customer_reviews.title: Extremely cheap quality for the price-very dissapointed!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bag the first time I laid eyes on it! After receiving it the very next day it had string shedding from the handle and everyday it got worse. It's discolored in some areas. This bag should be priced at $20.00 because that's all it's worth. I still believe it is a very cute bag, but I should have returned it when I could!
customer_reviews.author: Gucci Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a smaller mom
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a smaller mom, love the pockets and fabric. Love the purse type shoulder straps or the canvas messenger bag straps. Bought mine as a warehouse deal and was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia I.

customer_reviews.title: This diaper bag has been well loved. Love the design so hubby would carry it ...
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag has been well loved. Love the design so hubby would carry it too. Several pockets within the big pocket for easier organization as well as pockets on outside. Side pocket is the perfect size for a water bottle or sippy cup
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Like other's have said the seam where the handles attach ...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this diaper bag for a little over a year now and it's held up alright. Like other's have said the seam where the handles attach to the back does rip very easily. Overall it's a great sized bag, the inner pockets are nice, lots of outer pockets and the side pockets are great for bottles. I would say this is a great bag if you're on;y planning on using it for one child, as it probably won't last much longer than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Carleigh Rust

customer_reviews.title: Fits every piece of baby gear!
customer_reviews.text: First the bag is beautiful and sturdy. It has lots of pockets inside and out and the bag is long and wide rather than narrow and tall, which makes it harder to find everything at the bottom. Material is easy to wipe down and I love the fact there are other matching items for purchase. I am able to fit the newborn stuff and my toddler's stuff in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: E.D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This bag is cute and well made. But it's not a good diaper bag, especially for a cloth diapering mother. The outside open pockets "expose" anything you put in them... so your bag looks messy. I didn't have anywhere to store paperwork from the doctors office - even folded in half... without it peaking out of the bag. The inside pockets fill up the open space if you try to put anything in them. The tiny zipper pockets are useless and not quick and easy to get into. All around I'm disappointed in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: KUgirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It's a little smaller than I expected, but with the extra pockets and such it kinda balances it out for me. I really love the pattern and the overall size of the bag. Really happy about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this bag in January and already the stitching is falling apart. My new bag has a huge hole in it. I regret not sticking with the brand I had before. For the quality of stitching, this bag should cost half what they are charging. Read other reviews on JJ Cole diaper bags and you will find the same thing, stitching coming apart. My friend has the exact same bag and her straps are breaking. Is it so hard to change the quality of a bag after so many complaints? Even if they send me a replacement, I'll come across the same problem. Too bad I love everything else about this bag. Great space and a beautiful design.
customer_reviews.author: missmcdavis

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I tried 3 different diaper bags before finding this one after seeing a friend with it. The Skip Hop Via Messenger had a lot of good qualities but was a little too stiff which made it hard to access all the pockets easily. This one is roomy with so many pockets that are easy to get in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Overcast

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed after all
customer_reviews.text: am I allowed to change my review?? After about 6 months the inside lining has completely come apart from the bag. very disappointed after all.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and roomy diaper bag/handbag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag - it doubles as my handbag when I'm out with the baby (no need to carry a purse and a diaper bag). There is lots of room as there are 8 pockets on the outside and 4 on the inside, and the changing pad is easy to use and machine washable. Very cute and well-designed!
customer_reviews.author: L. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Took me a month before I decided to get this jj cole satchel. & I'm glad I did. It's a very pretty bag. Dosent look like a diaper bag at all. Got tons of complements. I own 2 Carter's diaper bag and personally, The jj cole satchel seems smaller. But it dose fit everything that I normally pack for my 3month old son. I love the four inside pockets It allows me to fit a lot inside. Just wanted to pass on the word that In other review they mentioned the straps tearing at the ring. Maybe I'll try and avoid that by using the long strap.
customer_reviews.author: shen

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag but horrible quality. Within two months the shoulder strap snapped. Just a few weeks later the liner on the inside ripped at the seems.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi B.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this diaper bag!! It's stylish, has lots of pockets and is easy to find stuff in it. The reason for only giving it 4 stars is that the lining in one of the outside compartments already ripped which is sad since you would expect better quality for a diaper bag that is constantly used.
customer_reviews.author: Sits

customer_reviews.title: Holds a ton of stuff and love all the pockets
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to daily bag. Holds a ton of stuff and love all the pockets! Used for 6 months and still looks new!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first time mom and really wanted that perfect diaper bag. I already had two that was given to me, but didn't quite work. This diaper bag is a great size lots of pockets for storage. Even the zipper pockets in the front are so convenient for those little items to store instead of digging for them. The other great thing I like was the side pocket for the bottle prefect! The color is great for boy or girl which I have a little girl and it fits us great.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherGBG

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag! It comes with stroller grips which I didn't notice prior to ordering, so just don't be dumb like me and order extra stroller grips!
customer_reviews.author: whitney b.

customer_reviews.title: Not just a diaper bag anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag as one of my carry on's for an upcoming vacation. With all the pockets and large inside, its perfect for all my belongings ended for an air flight. Love it! and, it doesn't look like a dire bag. I will use the changing pad to wrap my iPad in so all items are useful, even if you don't have a baby. I used the straps in my car so I could put hangers on it... great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug from Mars

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag! I love the stroller connectors. It has many pockets to organize stuff and it's roomy enough to pack for a weekend trip.
customer_reviews.author: Lcarbajal

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper after 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. I’ve only been using for 3 months and the zipper broke. I thought it would be better quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and roomy
customer_reviews.text: I can't say how this bag will hold up since I haven't started using it yet but I love the look of the bag! It feels more like a purse than you're standard diaper bag. The inside is a nice lime green so it is perfect for carrying around with our baby boy! It seems very well made and I hope it will hold up well!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ann

customer_reviews.title: get a ton of compliments on the aesthetics of this ...
customer_reviews.text: get a ton of compliments on the aesthetics of this bag, it's roomy enough for everything (I tend to over prepare), and it has a ton of separate pockets for the OCD organizer in me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ella Payne

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I carried a Skip Hop City chic bag for 3 years with my first child and it was starting to fall apart. I searched for another bag that didn't look cheap and was spacious enough for 2 kids (11 month old and a 4 year old). I LOVE this bag. I wish I would've ordered it sooner. Mine is green on the inside. (not pink as mentioned in another comment) It holds everything I need and still closes with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hill

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: The description says the diaper bag is laminated so I assumed that meant it was just like the one my friend got from babies r us. Mine arrived and it is NOT laminated at all. But nevertheless I still really like the diaper bag. It holds everything in place and the stroller connectors work great so it doesn't hurt my shoulder when we are out! Overall a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, however, the handle cracked at the base in less than 2 weeks of use. The company was great to work with, and I am currently getting a replacement (hopefully the new one does not have the same issue).
customer_reviews.author: Karra

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality lining
customer_reviews.text: Lining tore away from zipper after just a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Cute Bag
customer_reviews.text: I looked around a lot before my baby came for the perfect diaper bag, and I liked this one the best. I love the gray pattern and it has lots of room and I like all the pockets. It's big, but that's what I was expecting. It seems well made and of good material.I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: C & C Welton

customer_reviews.title: I Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I Love this bag! Very well made exterior, inside is more durable than it looks. I cram it pretty full and there are no tears yet. It helps me stay organized since my family has claimed real estate in my purse. Everyone gets a pocket and because it is so well organized, the bag feels so much lighter! I LOVE the look of it; great accessory when dressing up or down. Great Bag!
customer_reviews.author: K Manwarren

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed. Zipper broken.
customer_reviews.text: Not able to handle regular use for long periods of time. I've used daily for 4-5 months, and the zipper completely broke off (metal part snapped) the main compartment, and the zipper tabs keep falling off the other zippers (tightening the metal piece increases risk of those snapping, too), and the handles are showing significant wear. The bag didn't even come with the detachable shoulder strap -- something I was initially willing to overlook, but this is just one more compounding issue. Great bag in theory -- not so much in practice.
customer_reviews.author: Piano2468

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it thus far! I like that it is big and I can fit so much stuff. It is by far cuter than anything I could find in a local store. The only thing I would change would be to have an internal zippered pocket to put some of my personal items. I don't like carrying them on the outside of the bag. Otherwise it's a great bag!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best bag out there, hands down
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely made the right choice when I bought this as my first diaper bag!! This thing holds sooo much! And I love to over pack. It's held up for vacations, being washed after messes like pet pee and juice, and is still in great condition. I've seen this used as a prop on TV shows like Grey's Anatomy and movies!
customer_reviews.author: gfellmet

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bag
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag. It's held together pretty well for the last almost two years and I'm not very gentle on this diaper bag. Only downside, early on the two zippers on the front pockets fell off. Other than that, pretty great. The straps near the metal rings have slight tearing and fray, but I would not expect the way I treat it to NOT have wear and tear. I get tons of compliments anywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer May

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Friend loved!! It was her Baby bag gift from me.
customer_reviews.author: Gbarnes

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute diaper bag! Haven't been using it longer than 2 weeks so I can't attest to the longevity of it, but it's been great so far. Pockets inside, and out. I had a mini-heart attack when my daughter dumped a whole thing of hand sanitizer on it, thinking it would stain, but it wiped right off! So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a baby gift, and she still has it 3 yrs later.
customer_reviews.author: RDAMOM

customer_reviews.title: Great for my use...
customer_reviews.text: I bough this for a tad unconventional use - as a nurse's bag. It's perfect for all my necessities like my stethoscope, pulse oximeter, etc. etc. There is SO much room and I can carry my lunch bag in it also. I love the color too!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great color, size
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter to use with my grandchild. Great color, size, and inside design. She loves the bag, but one of the stroller hooks has broken. Wish I could just order replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: schoolkid

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a baby shower gift. It is ADORABLE!! The interior is lime green and the bag is HUGE! I only wish they had this bag when my kids were babies. It is very stylish, well made and has a TON of pockets!
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs

customer_reviews.title: This bag is beautiful and fits my 5 ft small frame I cannot ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is beautiful and fits my 5 ft small frame I cannot wait to use it for my baby girl due in June and it’s not to girly so hubby can carry it also!!!!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this bag
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this bag! Not only is it beautiful, it's also huge! I am continuously amazed at how much stuff fits inside of it. I've only had it for 7mos, but so far no wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: After having this bag for almost a year, it still looks brand new. I love it. Sturdy, yet fun to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: jenna

customer_reviews.title: That's a Diaper Bag?
customer_reviews.text: I chose this diaper bag because it's super functional, yet looks more like a purse than a diaper bag. I cloth diaper, so space is important, and this bag fits the bill. I can also neatly organize my "purse items" in the smaller pockets, and when it's not stuffed full of diapers, I can use it as a computer bag. Win, win, win. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because I wish it were about an inch or two deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: although I'm sure it works wonderfully as one
customer_reviews.text: So I'm not using this as a diaper bag, although I'm sure it works wonderfully as one. I'm actually using this as a teacher tote bag. I'm able to easily carry most of my stuff to and from work each day. It's very sturdy, structured, and easily washable. It doesn't not sacrifice fashion for function though. Love the design.
customer_reviews.author: KKarlen

customer_reviews.title: excellent design, material
customer_reviews.text: A little bit bigger than expected, excellent design, material. Almost a year and looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: H.O

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! it holds all of the items from my purse, a snack for my 4 year old and formula/bottles/water for my baby, a change of clothes for each child, toy or two, blankie....it is the ideal mom bag. I love the shoulder strap and stroller handles too,
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: BEST DIAPER BAG EVER
customer_reviews.text: This bag has tons of compartments and uses! I have 3 kids and have gone through countless diaper bags over the years but this one is well made, has tons of room and is stylish. I get so many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: My daughter likes it
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my daughter. It is an attractive bag and seems sturdy. She really liked the straps to attach to the stroller. It is not huge like some diaper bags, sort of purselike.
customer_reviews.author: jillofspeed

product_meta.title: JJ Cole Satchel Diaper Bag, Stone Arbor
product_meta.description: Color:Stone ArborKeep track of baby's necessities in style with the JJ Cole Collections Satchel bag. The spacious interior includes multiple organizational compartments while the exterior offers easily-accessible open and zippered pockets. The Satchel includes 7 exterior pockets and 4 interior pockets and a convenient bottle pocket, providing plenty of space for everything you need along the way. The padded shoulder strap is removable to fit your own unique style and needs. The Satchel includes grips stroller attachments and a coordinating changing pad. Dimensions: 18"h x 12"w x 7"d. Weight: 1.6 lbs.
feature_bullets: Coordinating changing pad included.zip-top closure protects and secures contents

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars563 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
